actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of pensions to veterans of World War I.

summary.text: World War I Pension Act - Directs the Administrator of the Veterans Administratin to pay to each veteran of World War I, who meets the service requirements of this Act, a pension at the monthly rate of $150. Defines the terms "veteran" and "World War I". States that the pension under this Act shall be paid to a veteran withour regard to his annual income, if solely derived from the payments of social security benefits, railroad retirement benefits, or pensions. Sets forth specified minimum service requirements for a veteran to be eligible for a pension under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of pensions to veterans of World War I.
